\cvEventBullet{Created a method for inserting animations into existing video content}

\cvEventBullet{Developed software for displaying glasses-free, 3D media via autostereoscopy}
\cvEventBullet{Made an algorithm that synthesized extreme viewpoints from stereo images and videos}

\cvEventHeader{Computer vision engineer (contract)}{Precision Augmented Reality Works}{2013}
\cvEventBullet{Created software to detect changes in retail store displays for inventory management}
\cvEventBullet{Implemented a method to automatically register 3D inventory models with image data}

\cvEventHeader{Intern}{Adobe Research}{2012}
\cvEventBullet{Published an image editing method for automatically inserting 3D models into pictures}
\cvEventBullet{Aspects of this work have been integrated into Adobe Dimension}

\cvEventHeader{Intern}{Microsoft Research}{2011}
\cvEventBullet{Published a single image depth estimation technique}
\cvEventBullet{Created a new-view synthesis algorithm for generating stereo images and accompanying dataset}

\cvEventHeader{Intern}{Naval Research Laboratory}{2009}
\cvEventBullet{Researched and implemented graphical representations for occluded objects in AR}
\cvEventBullet{Conducted user studies to determine which representation should be used in an AR system used by soldiers}

\cvEventHeader{Software Engineer}{Reynolds Journalism Institute}{2008-2009}
\cvEventBullet{Led a team of four students to implement a unique news-based iPhone application (Newsflash)}

\cvEventHeader{Intern}{Department of Defense}{2008}
\cvEventBullet{Implemented a mesh segmentation algorithm using a modified form of mean-shift segmentation}
\cvEventBullet{Presented research at the Maneuver Support and Technology Conference}
\cvEventBullet{Developed automatic terrain visualization software}
